## Fog interface

Interface that defines the options to configure fog.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Fog 
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [color](./harp-datasource-protocol.fog.color.md) | string | Fog's color. |
|  [startRatio](./harp-datasource-protocol.fog.startratio.md) | number | Distance ratio to far plane at which the linear fog begins. |
